snippet: This new-music ensemble turned its gaze inward and back with a program titled “Epitaphs: Music in Memoriam.”
abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews Epitaphs: Music in Memoriam, performance by new-music ensemble Counter)induction at Church of the Intercession.
lead_paragraph: This new-music ensemble turned its gaze inward and back with a program titled “Epitaphs: Music in Memoriam.”
